root: ^Hi there Anko. The village is looking great today!
^I know right! Mama and Papa and all the other villagers are super happy about it.
^That's great to hear, your effort is really paying off Anko!
^Speaking of which, are there any flowers you want to pick today?
^Hmmmm... Not today, I think I'm going to study and play with my friends later.
^That sounds wonderful, be safe and have fun.
